summary: This is a mod im working on, its not even close to done. I suggest not downloading until i finish.
descriptionHtml:
For the person in the comments asking what this mod might eventually turn out to be:
I'm going for a quest/dungeon mod that can either end up in a completed quest, with loot and such, or a follower. Considering on the choices that you make and the actions that you do to others, you will get one outcome or the other. Right now I'm building the dungeon itself, working on combat attributes, different enemies, patrols, etc. Things I have completed is the physical follower (Samantha Rhode) but, I want to eventually get her custom voice acted, because I hate the vanilla insults, war cries, jokes, etc. So its a really ambitious mod, especially it being my first. So I hope this answers any questions. Thanks for the comments everyone.
author: nahtan45
